member.name: M:NN.POS.API.Controllers.V1.BusinessPartnerController.Get(NN.POS.Model.Dtos.BusinessPartners.GetBusinessPartnerDto)
member.summary: Get BP base condition: dto.ContactType => [None = 0, Supplier = 1, Customer = 2, SupplierCustomer = 3] dto.BusinessType => [0: None, 1: Individual, 2: Business]
